Name: AbrasiveSponge
Description: An abrasive sponge is a cleaning tool designed to scrub away tough dirt and grime from surfaces using its rough, abrasive surface. It is typically made from materials such as nylon, polyester, or natural fibers, and is commonly used in the kitchen and bathroom for cleaning dishes, pots, pans, and other surfaces.

Name: Apple
Description: An apple is a round or oval-shaped fruit with a red, green, or yellow skin, a crisp, juicy flesh, and a core with seeds in the center.

Name: Bag
Description: A bag is a container made of flexible or rigid materials, such as cloth, paper, or plastic, used to store or transport objects. It often has an opening at the top and can be closed with a zipper, button, or other fastening mechanism. Bags come in a variety of shapes and sizes and are used for a wide range of purposes, from carrying groceries and books to holding personal belongings when traveling.

Name: Banana
Description: A banana is a long, curved fruit with a yellow skin that is easy to peel, a soft, sweet flesh, and small seeds inside.

Name: Baseball
Description: A baseball is a ball used in the sport of baseball, made of cork or rubber, and covered with leather or synthetic materials, and is roughly the size of an adult's fist.

Name: BleachCleanserBottle
Description: A bleach cleanser bottle is a container designed to hold a cleaning solution that contains bleach, a powerful disinfectant and stain remover. It typically has a nozzle or cap that dispenses the solution in a controlled manner to effectively clean and sanitize surfaces.

Name: Bottle
Description: A container with a narrow neck used to store fluids.

Name: Bowl
Description: A round, deep object used to contain food or liquid.

Name: CerealBox
Description: A box which holds, or at least is intended to usually hold, cereal flakes.

Name: CoffeeCan
Description: A coffee can is a cylindrical container typically made of metal or plastic, used for storing and transporting coffee or other dry goods.

Name: CoffeePack
Description: A coffee pack typically refers to a package containing ground coffee or coffee beans used for making coffee, usually in a drip coffee maker, espresso machine, or French press. The packaging is designed to keep the coffee fresh and flavorful, and often includes information on the type of roast, flavor profile, and origin of the coffee.

Name: CrackerBox
Description: A box containing, or at least intended to contain, crackers. A cracker is a flat, dry-baked pastry, usually made from flour.

Name: Cup
Description: A round shaped container used for storing liquid and drinking out of it, typically has  a handle for grasping.

Name: Cupboard
Description: A cupboard is a piece of furniture used for storage, typically in the kitchen or dining room, and often used for storing dishes, glassware, and food items. It can come in various shapes and sizes, ranging from small wall-mounted cabinets to larger standalone units with multiple shelves and compartments.

Name: DesignedChair
Description: A piece of furniture designed for one person to sit on.

Name: DesignedHandle
Description: An item designed to fit well within a grasping hand, often attached to another item to enhance its manipulability.

Name: DesignedHandle
Description: An item designed to fit well within a grasping hand, often attached to another item to enhance its manipulability.

Name: Dice
Description: Dice are small, cube-shaped objects with markings on each face, typically used in games of chance and gambling, to generate random numbers, or for other recreational purposes.

Name: Dishwasher
Description: An appliance for washing dishes and cutlery automatically.

Name: DishwasherTab
Description: A solid detergent inserted into dishwashers.

Name: Door
Description: A hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle, or in the frame of a cupboard.

Name: Drawer
Description: A storage compartment without a lid, made to slide horizontally in and out of a piece of furniture.

Name: FoamBrick
Description: A foam brick is a soft, rectangular block made of foam, used for support or cushioning, often in sports or fitness activities.

Name: Fork
Description: Cutlery with two or more prongs used for lifting food to the mouth or holding it when cutting.

Name: Glass
Description: A container made usually from glass or transparent plastic which is used to hold, typically cold, beverages.

Name: GlassCleanerSprayBottle
Description: A glass cleaner spray bottle is a container designed to hold a cleaning solution specifically formulated for cleaning glass surfaces. It typically has a spray nozzle that dispenses the solution in a fine mist for easy application onto the surface.

Name: GolfBall
Description: A golf ball is a small, round ball used in the sport of golf, typically made of rubber and synthetic materials, with dimples on its surface to increase lift and reduce drag.

Name: JellOStrawberryBox
Description: A box containing, or at least normally intended to contain, Jell-O brand strawberry flavored gelatin.

Name: JelloBox
Description: A box containing, or at least normally intended to contain, jello.

Name: JuiceBox
Description: A juice box is a container made of paperboard, with a small attached plastic straw, used for packaging and drinking juice. They are typically single-serving and convenient for on-the-go consumption.

Name: KitchenCabinet
Description: A cupboard designed to be used in kitchen environments.

Name: Kiwi
Description: Kiwi is a small, oval-shaped fruit with brown fuzzy skin and bright green flesh inside, packed with nutrients such as vitamin C, vitamin K, and potassium. It has a tangy, sweet flavor and is often eaten raw, added to salads or smoothies, or used as a garnish.

Name: Knife
Description: An instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon.

Name: Lemon
Description: A lemon is a yellow citrus fruit with a sour taste, acidic juice, and versatile use in cooking and beverages.

Name: Marble
Description: A marble is a small, spherical toy made of glass, stone, or other materials, used in games, competitions, or for decoration.

Name: MetalBowl
Description: A metal bowl is a container made from metal material, typically stainless steel or aluminum, and used for various purposes such as mixing ingredients, serving food, or as a decorative object. It is durable, easy to clean, and can withstand high temperatures, making it ideal for use in the kitchen.

Name: MetalMug
Description: A metal mug is a drinking vessel made from metal material, typically stainless steel or copper, and designed to hold hot or cold beverages. It is sturdy, reusable, and often used for camping, outdoor activities, or as a travel mug.

Name: MetalPlate
Description: A metal plate is a flat, thin, and usually circular or rectangular piece of metal material, often made from stainless steel or aluminum. It is commonly used for serving food, as a component in machinery, or for decorative purposes, and is durable and easy to clean.

Name: MilkPack
Description: A pack which holds, or at least is intended to usually hold, milk.

Name: MiniSoccerBall
Description: A mini soccer ball is a smaller version of a regulation soccer ball, often used for training, indoor or recreational play, or for promotional or decorative purposes.

Name: MustardBottle
Description: Mustard bottle refers to a squeezable container that dispenses mustard.

Name: Napkin
Description: A square piece of cloth or paper used at a meal to wipe the fingers or lips and to protect garments

Name: NaturalPerson
Description: A person in the physical commonsense intuition: 'have you seen that person walking down the street?'

Name: Orange
Description: An orange is a round citrus fruit with a tough, bright orange skin, pulpy flesh with sections, and a juicy, tangy flavor.

Name: OreganoShaker
Description: An oregano shaker is a container used for storing and dispensing dried oregano spice, which is commonly used in cooking to add flavor and aroma to dishes. The shaker typically has small holes or slots on the top to allow for controlled dispensing of the oregano flakes.

Name: PancakeMixBottle
Description: A pancake mix bottle is a container that holds pre-made pancake batter, ready to be cooked. These bottles usually come with a nozzle for easy pouring and can be found in different sizes and shapes.

Name: PastryBox
Description: A pastry box is a container used to transport and store pastries such as cakes, pies, and tarts. It is typically made of cardboard or plastic and designed to keep the pastries fresh and protected during transport, with features such as secure lids and inserts to prevent movement and damage.

Name: Peach
Description: A peach is a round fruit with a fuzzy skin, juicy flesh, a large pit in the center, and a sweet, delicate flavor.

Name: Pear
Description: A pear is a sweet, juicy fruit with a bulbous shape, a thin skin, and a core with seeds in the center.

Name: Pitcher
Description: A pitcher is a container, usually made of glass or ceramic, with a handle and spout used for holding and pouring beverages such as water, juice, or tea.

Name: PlasticChain
Description: Plastic chain is a chain made from plastic links that are interconnected to form a continuous chain. It is often used as a visual barrier or for crowd control in public places, as well as for decorative purposes in events, exhibitions, and retail displays.

Name: PlasticKnife
Description: A plastic knife is a cutting tool made from plastic material, typically polypropylene or polystyrene, and is lightweight and disposable. It is commonly used for cutting soft foods such as cake or fruit, or as a safer alternative to metal knives in environments where metal utensils are not allowed.

Name: Plate
Description: A flat and usually circular object from which food is eaten or served.

Name: Plum
Description: A plum is a small, round or oval-shaped fruit with a smooth, edible skin, juicy, sweet or tart flesh, and a small pit in the center.

Name: Pot
Description: Pot is a container, typically made of ceramic or clay, used for cooking, serving, or storing food. It comes in various shapes, sizes, and designs and is a common household item found in many cultures around the world.

Name: PottedMeatCan
Description: A can containing, or at least normally intended to contain, potted meat

Name: PringlesChipsCan
Description: Pringles chips can refers to a cylindrical container that holds Pringles brand potato chips.

Name: PuddingBox
Description: A box containing, or at least normally intended to contain pudding powder.

Name: Racquetball
Description: A racquetball ball is a small, hollow rubber ball used in the sport of racquetball, designed to be bouncy and to move quickly in the enclosed court.

Name: Rope
Description: A rope is a length of thick, strong, twisted or braided fibers or cords, typically made of natural or synthetic materials, used for tying, lifting, pulling, or securing objects or people.

Name: SaltShaker
Description: A shaker which holds, or at least is intended to usually hold, salt.

Name: ServingMat
Description: A serving mat is a type of table mat used to protect surfaces from spills and stains while serving food or drinks. They are typically made from materials such as fabric, plastic, or silicone and come in various shapes, sizes, and designs to suit different occasions and styles.

Name: Shelf
Description: A shelf board is a flat piece of wood, metal, or glass which is attached to a wall or to the sides of a cupboard. Shelves are used for keeping things on.

Name: Skillet
Description: A skillet is a flat-bottomed pan with slanted sides and a long handle, used for frying, saut√©ing, or searing foods.

Name: SoftBall
Description: A soft ball is a ball made of a softer, lighter material than a regulation baseball, often used in recreational or amateur leagues, or in games played by children.

Name: Spatula
Description: A spatula is a flat, broad kitchen tool with a long handle used for flipping and lifting food items, such as pancakes, eggs, or burgers, while cooking.

Name: Spoon
Description: An eating or cooking implement consisting of a small shallow bowl with a relatively long handle.

Name: StackingBlocks
Description: Stacking blocks are a popular children's toy consisting of various sized and shaped blocks that can be stacked on top of each other to form towers or structures. They are often made of wood, plastic or foam, and are used to improve fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving abilities in young children.

Name: Strawberry
Description: A strawberry is a small, red fruit with a juicy texture, sweet taste, and tiny seeds on the surface, commonly used in desserts or as a snack.

Name: SugarBox
Description: A box containing, or at least usually intended to contain, sugar.

Name: Table
Description: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

Name: TableCloth
Description: A tablecloth is a large, rectangular piece of fabric or vinyl used to cover and protect a dining table from spills and stains, as well as to add aesthetic appeal to the setting.

Name: TeaBagBox
Description: A tea bag box is a container used for storing and organizing tea bags, typically made of cardboard or other durable materials and featuring separate compartments for different types or flavors of tea. These boxes are commonly used in households, offices, and restaurants to keep tea bags readily available for brewing.

Name: TennisBall
Description: A tennis ball is a small, round ball made of rubber with a fuzzy, felt-like outer layer, used in the sport of tennis, as well as in other games, such as fetch for dogs.

Name: TomatoSoupCan
Description: Tomato soup can refers to a cylindrical metal container that holds condensed or ready-to-eat tomato soup.

Name: Toothpaste
Description: Toothpaste is a gel or paste used for cleaning teeth and maintaining oral hygiene. It typically contains abrasives, fluoride, and other active ingredients that help remove plaque, prevent tooth decay, and freshen breath.

Name: ToyotaHSR
Description: Toyota's HSR is a compact mobile cobot (collaborative robot) platform that can move around and fetch objects using a multi-DOF arm while avoiding obstacles. Operable by voice command or by tablet PC, HSR has a highly maneuverable, compact, and lightweight cylindrical body with a folding arm that enables it to pick up objects off the floor, suction up thin objects, retrieve objects from high locations, open curtains, and perform other household tasks.

Name: TrashBin
Description: A container for holding waste or garbage.

Name: Tray
Description: A flat, shallow container with a raised rim, typically used for carrying food and drink, or for holding small items or loose material.

Name: TunaFishCan
Description: Tuna fish can refers to a metal container used to store and preserve tuna fish.

Name: Washer
Description: A washer is a thin, flat ring-shaped object, typically made of metal, rubber, or plastic, used to distribute the load of a threaded fastener such as a screw or bolt, or as a spacer, seal, or locking device.

Name: WineGlass
Description: A glass which holds, or at least is intended to usually hold, wine. Also affords drinking from it.
